医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究的人阐明了全球孕产妇死亡危机根据世界卫生组织（WHO）今天发布的一项新研究，出血 - 严重的严重出血 - 诸如先兆子痫之类的高血压疾病是孕产妇死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/who-study-sheds-light-on-n-global-mortnal-mortalath-mortality-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250309/who-study-sheds-light-on-global-mortnal-mortaly-mortality-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8bfae0e-3d04-4fe04fe0-a767-08acddea99399 Sun, 09 Mar 2025 12:58:59 -0400 WHO study sheds light on global maternal mortality crisis
了解LSD1在细胞过程和疾病中的作用一项新的综述凸显了LSD1（赖氨酸特异性去甲基酶1）在调节关键细胞过程及其对人类疾病的影响中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/understanding-the-role-f-lsd1-in-cellular-processes-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/understanding-the-role-of-lsd1-in-cellular-processes-and-processes-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68FCC307-2E99-415D-BC49-54C569518407 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 11:25:00 -0400 Understanding the role of LSD1 in cellular processes and disease
阐明肺癌中LUAD和LUSC之间的遗传差异肺癌仍然是癌症相关死亡率的主要原因之一，肺腺癌（LUAD）和肺鳞状细胞癌（LUSC）代表非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）最普遍的亚型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/unraveling-the-the-genetic-differences-between-luad-and-and-lusc-in-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/unraveling-the-the-genetic-differences-between-luad-and-and-lusc-in-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d456bfdf-4EE2-4B54-AB42-D5411EB6CFC6 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 11:13:00 -0400 Unraveling the genetic differences between LUAD and LUSC in lung cancer
圆形RNA在癌症生物学和治疗中起关键作用一篇新的评论文章强调了循环RNA（Circrna）在癌症中的变革性作用，揭示了其作为肿瘤生物学的关键参与者的潜力，也是对未来疗法的有前途的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/circular-rna-plays-key-reole-incancer-incancer-biology-and-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/circular-rna-plays-key-reole-incancer-incancer-biology-biology-and-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce460383-b8f7-4645-B424-FEC61E50EFD6 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 11:02:49 -0400 Circular RNA plays key role in cancer biology and therapy
美国儿童中的芬太尼中毒在八年内急剧增加一项新的研究显示，美国儿童的事件被合成阿片类药物芬太尼“增加并变得更加严重”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/fentanyl-poisonings-pooisonings-mong-children-in-the-the-us-incrase-sharrply-vor-sharply-over over over-eights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/fentanyl-poisisings-poisising-mong-children-in-the-us-incrase-sharpher-sharply-bover-yover-comments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9633bbe-0f79-433b-a2223-2c131e250b62 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 10:56:00 -0400 Fentanyl poisonings among children in the U.S. increase sharply over eight years
范德比尔特的研究人员旨在使用AI为任何目标开发抗体疗法范德比尔特大学医学中心调查人员领导的一个雄心勃勃的项目旨在使用人工智能技术来针对任何感兴趣的抗原靶标生成抗体疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/vanderbilt-researchers-researchers-aim-to-so-to-ise-ai-to-develop-develop-antibody-antibody-therapies-therapies-therapies-for-anytarget.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/vanderbilt-researchers-researchers-aim-to-so-to-ise-ai-to-develop-develop--antibody-therapy-therapies-therapies-for-any-target.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d3f0741-6544-46d4-46d4-a792-bd1d00216ce3 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 10:35:00 -0400 Vanderbilt researchers aim to use AI to develop antibody therapies for any target
范德比尔特肺移植在2024年实现了创纪录的99个程序范德比尔特肺移植的外科医生和团队在2024年进行了99次肺移植，这是有史以来最多的一年。其中两个程序涉及结合器官移植。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/vanderbilt-lung-transplant-achieves-record-break-breaking-99-procedures-n-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/vanderbilt-lung-transplant-achieves-record-break-breaking-99-procedures-in-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=878912AB-EC7F-45A1-B7EB-C18D3666AC0CC Sat, 08 Mar 2025 10:24:00 -0400 Vanderbilt Lung Transplant achieves record-breaking 99 procedures in 2024
小鼠向受伤的同伴展示了类似响应者的行为人类可能不是唯一在受伤时帮助朋友的人。如最近在科学上发表的凯克医学院的科学家所领导的一项新研究所示，小鼠也可以做到这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/mice-demstrate-first-responder-like-behavior-toward-ingard-injured-companions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/mice-dymstrate-first-responder-like-behavior-toward-toward-injured-companions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=268fb3d6-7048-43f1-a410-770bf6d60487 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 10:15:00 -0400 Mice demonstrate first responder-like behavior toward injured companions
研究表明，美国心血管健康的鸿沟不断增长3月6日在柳叶刀区域健康中发表的一项研究强调了美国心血管健康的鸿沟日益增长，表明财富和教育在心脏病风险中起着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/study-reveals-growing-divide-in-cardiascular-health-health-health-health-health-in-the-us.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250308/study-reveals-growing-divide-in-cardiascular-health-health-health-health-in-the-us.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9c94a68-c837-40b6-40b6-8b6-8b0f-2666ae91fed33 Sat, 08 Mar 2025 10:07:00 -0400 Study reveals growing divide in cardiovascular health in the U.S.
